text: Intel flies 1,218 drones at PyeongChang Olympics—drone shows become broadcast‑class.
Fire risk drives western cities to explore drone shows; Colorado pivots in press & practice.
Disneyland Paris debuts Disney D‑Light; wins Best Live Entertainment 2022; proves park viability.
U.S. metros normalize holiday shows (Denver 300‑drone); Disney Electrical Sky Parade (~500). Pyro‑drone hybrids emerge.
UVify sets Guinness Record with 5,293 drones in Korea with SPH/DSS—proof of DSS‑led scale.
Denver plans 40‑night seasonal programming; Vietnam reports 10,518‑drone show—rapid scale inflation.
